name: aima
author: David Pomerenke
description: Implementation of Russell & Norvig, "Artificial Intelligence - A Modern Approach".

scripts.test: npm run prepare && node --require source-map-support/register index.js
scripts.build-docs: docco readme.litcoffee --layout linear && mv docs/readme.html docs/index.html
scripts.coverage: coffee --compile --output index.mjs readme.litcoffee && c8 node index.mjs --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov
